name: Fall 2019 - 470 - Open Water
description:
Play as Jet, a man on his jet ski with the misfortune of constantly finding people in peril. Navigate the high seas with your radar to find survivors and bring them to the safety docks scattered around the islands. Use your boost to evade incoming enemies and snatch survivors from the jaws of death. In order to traverse each level successfully, you must avoid the many sea serpents that lurk below the ocean’s surface. 

The serpents will jump out of the water to eat as many survivors as they can and it is your job as the player to rescue them before they are eaten. Once all of the  survivors are accounted for, whether they have been eaten or saved, you will complete the level if you have saved more people than have died.

*Requires an Xbox controller in order to play
